document_data.name: ''Ring of Divine Power''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of divine power''''' were [[enchanted]] [[ring]]s that allowed [[divine]] spellcasters to boost thane magics through a connection to the ''[[weave]]''.
document_data.Powers: These rings harnessed the power of the ''weave'' and allowed the wearer to draw more divine power from their deity on a daily basis. ''Rings of divine power'' were created in several power levels, allowing the wearers to access divine spells of various levels of mastery and complexity.
document_data.History: These rings were created by artisan-priests of [[Mystra]] some years before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
